attributes.action: Increase the amount of driving penalty points allowed from 12 to 20  for drivers who exceed 15,000 miles per annum.
attributes.additional_details: It is unfair that somebody who drives a vehicle for a living should be punished in the same way a somebody who may only drive a vehicle for a couple of hours per week. I would like to petition to have the number of driving penalty points allowed raised from 12 points to 20 points for people who drive over 15,000 miles per annum.
